class_notes:
This class is open to enrolled Emory College students only. You must email the SON Office of Education at nrsgpermissioninquiries@emory.edu for registration approval and support. 
Pre-requisite lectures will be online synchronous sessions at the time specified. All lab experiences will be online. Asynchronous means students will log in at a time convenient to them to complete the work required for a course or lab session.
course_description: This course introduces students to core principles and concepts of microbiology. Topic areas include microorganisms (bacteria, fungi, protozoa, viruses), microbial taxonomy, technology used to study microorganisms, microbial life cycle/metabolism and host-microbe interaction. Laboratory experiences.
